item.description:
Join us to practice your skills and meet new salsa-lovers! It's the perfect way to spend a Sunday afternoon!

30-50 dancers of all levels attend our meet-up each week to socialize, practice, learn from and teach each other. There is no organized instruction, but instructors are available to answer questions, give tips and dance with you! Everyone is friendly and welcoming, so please come ready to ask people to dance.

And for those of you who DO want instruction, we now offer a terrific Salsa Technique class right before the meet-up, so you have new things to practice all afternoon!

Salsa Sunday Schedule:
4:00-5:00 Salsa Technique Class (For Beginner & Advanced Beginner Dancers)
5:00-6:30 Open Practice and Social Dancing

Prices:
Class: $15
Meet-up & Practice: $5
And you can join us at Ryles anytime from 7-midnight (just $7 with the meet-up discount!)

To get more more information about these (or any) of our classes, training programs or performance team, please feel free to contact me or visit www.metamovements.com

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Boston/Cambridge Salsa Sundays Meet-up
